text: Glenn Robertson Yarbrough (January 12, 1930 â€“ August 11, 2016) was an American folk singer and guitarist. He was the lead singer (tenor) with the Limeliters from 1959 to 1963. He was known for his songs "Baby the Rain Must Fall", "It's Gonna Be Fine", "San Francisco Bay Blues". He was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Yarbrough died of problems from dementia in Nashville, Tennessee at the age of 86. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American folk singers Category:American guitarists Category:American tenors Category:Singers from Milwaukee Category:Musicians from Milwaukee Category:Deaths from dementia
title: Glenn Yarbrough
